1.post_text: With a 100% Angus beef patty and melt-in-your-mouth creamy Colby cheese, the Classic Angus Cheese is a treat that tastes as good as it looks. And don’t forget to indulge in the Roasted Sesame with Seaweed Shaker Fries too!

comments.message: Its the pineapple. The tangy sourness pineapple mellows down the jelak of the crispy chicken, while enhancing the freshness of the vegetables. IMO this should be one of the best new creation so far, which should be added to the menu as stable.
Why is it out of stock in so many outlets!? We tried Chinatown, Bugis, Tiong Bahru, Yishun....
When macs is busy. They may even give u a burger without any buttermilk meat
PLEASE BRING IT BACK IT SEEMS TO BE OUT OF STOCK EVERYWHERE. PLEASE!!!

Geylang Mcdonalds McDelivery.. Please make sure you guys check the order before sending the foods for delivery... always had bad experience from Geylang.... ur MDS in charge is lazy or what??? Complaints but no improvement...

Love it.. everything blend in so well.. with the pineapple and the sauce it taste like sweet and sour. Chicken not dry and generous serving 🖒🖒.
Now Buttermilk Crispy Chicken is 1st in my McD list   follow by Prosperity Burger.
Tried it half an hr ago, didn't remember eating pineapples. Wasit removed?

Sweet Juicy Pineapple and Juicy Chicken Thigh! 😚 The sauce is also just right taste and amount to the lettuce. 
Dun like the Korean Burger as sauce too salty but this Buttermilk Crispy Chicken is a winner! 😄👍🏻

And best to eat it hot! 😬

I've figured it out. Buttermilk crispy chicken came out on Good Friday, Labour day and Vesak day and the next public holiday. For some strange reasons the guys manning this Facebook page doesn't know how to announce this due to or their poor English language command @mcdsg
Love the pineapple in this burger! Generous serving of it, and the buttermilk chicken taste great!
2 weekends and it's still out of stock?!  The seaweed shaker fries also out of stock! Totally unacceptable.

Is this butter chicken coming back ? 
Can this promotion be extended as this only serve us for two weeks after that is out of stock or hopefully this can be the permanent menu for McDonald's as this is another alternative choice for people who like to have mcspicy chicken thigh but not the spicy .. butter chicken is the choice ....!!!
Can I implore McD to have this burger forever and ever??!!!
These items won't fly , pineapples 🍍 don't go well with a bun.....gone. Skip
Buttermilk crispy chicken is the best burger in MCD for me . Hope will be permanently in the main menu 😙

Doesn't taste that great because.. :/
- Burger is too big and hard to eat for average/small mouth people.
- Cheese is kinda disgusting sorry..
- Meat is just like mcspicy's chicken but not spicy.
- Pineapple is sweet and nice but it doesn't work well with burger ._. I eat them separately.
THE BEST THING ABOUT THIS BURGER IS THE BUN ITSELF. THE BUTTERMILK BUN TASTE IS SUPERB!! <3 <3 <3

I feel like over the years the food standard of McDonald's has dropped a lot... Usually when I order the burgers I can taste that the patties are either not hot/made-to-order or are usually quite small given the price. I love mcd, hence I'm disappointed....🙁

This burger seems too oversized for the average people to bite into it which the fillings keeps flowing out all over the sides of the burger. You dun get to taste it properly and most times you only get the taste of only one of it's ingredients. I believe if you are able to bite it with all the ingredients, it would taste more awesome

The feeling is like "Each bite into the chicken in these delectable burger made me feel like I was eating a cloud. The soft and fluffy mousse instantly melted in my mouth and left no cloying sensation.
Love the whole combination and generous greens to go with the wonderfully succulent deep fried chicken..... 😋
Finally a proper chicken burger I can eat from Mac without having to worry abt my bowel movements the following day..
Butter lettuce for the crunchiness but the ultimate winner is the winner preparing it.different outlets different taste
The Buttermilk Crispy Chicken Burger is much better then the Kimchi burger, pls NO MORE Kimchi burger.
The pineapple makes this burger a true winner. Good job.

Wake up happier with our coffee upgrades. Simply add $1 to any breakfast set to upgrade your
Premium Roast Coffee to a Cappuccino or Latte, made from 100% Arabica beans. In other words, quality at an affordable price! Now that’s reason enough to keep you sipping and smiling.

comments.message: I have always been supporting McCafé. From the card system to present apps . Recently, there are a lot of problems when I purchased my drink and was unable to get a stamp as I was told system down etc... it happened too many times. The barrister even told me that this is a common problem. She told me to bring the receipt to any McCafé and I will get the stamp . However when I tried to get the stamp by showing my receipt to T3 McCafé , I was turned down as they told me it has expired . The thing is firstly the barrister did not tell me it is within 3 months when I purchased it elsewhere. Secondly, system down is not my fault . How come it has became my problem... disappointed with the McCafé service

5.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0530 hours on 19 April 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

Not so fast Morty, you heard your mom. We've got adventures to go on Morty. Just you and me. And sometimes your sister and sometimes your mom but never your dad. You wanna know why Morty? Because he crossed me. Oh it gets darker Morty. Welcome to the darkest year of our adventures. First thing that's different, no more dad Morty. He threatened to turn me in to the government. So I made him and the government go away. I've replaced them both as the de facto patriarch of your family and your universe. Your mom wouldn't have accepted me if I came home without you and your sister, so now you know the real reason I rescued you. I just took over the family Morty and if you tell your mom or sister I said any of this, I'll deny it. And they'll take my side because I'm a hero Morty. And now you're gonna go and do whatever I say Morty. Forever. And I'll go out and I'll find some more of that Mulan Szeschuan Teriyaki dipping sauce Morty. Because that's what this is all about Morty. That's my one-arm man. I'm not driven by avenging my dead family Morty. That was fake. I'm driven by finding that Mcnugget sauce. I want that Mulan Mcnugget sauce Morty. That's my series arc Morty. If it takes nine seasons. I want my Mcnugget dipping sauce Szeschuan sauce Morty. That's what's going to take us all the way to the end Morty. Season nine more seasons Morty. Nine more seasons until I get that dipping Szeschuan sauce. For ninety-seven more years Morty. I want that Mcnugget sauce Morty!

Hi McDonald's. This morning, at 9.57am I ordered a chicken sausage breakfast wrap. The guy taking my orders kept typing in chicken ham breakfast wrap twice even though I already told him it was chicken sausage. On the third time, he finally seemed to get it and re-typed my order again. However, when I came back home and checked, I realised that he gave me a chicken ham breakfast wrap again. I'm disappointed and annoyed as the whole time the guy who took my orders kept messing it up. I had coupons from the surprise alarm that I could use to get a cheaper meal but he kept asking for the full price even though I asked him to check again as there's no way my meal could've been $46 after discount. I hope you can look into this matter. I've always been a loyal customer of your branch at Tampines West CC even though I already encountered problems with my orders a few times. Thank you for your kind attention and I hope you can reply soon.

18.post_text: Hey folks, you may have seen stories about the use of ammonia hydroxide in our burgers circulating online or via WhatsApp. Well, it’s entirely untrue. Here in Singapore, we’ve never used beef treated with ammonia hydroxide or “pink slime”. You can rest assured that our beef patties in all your favourite McDonald’s burgers are made from 100% beef from Australia and New Zealand!

Review for McDonald's at Gardens by the Bay: Good day, I had the worst McDonald’s experience at Gardens by the Bay today, May 31 between 11:30am to 11:45 am. It seems the people who work there have no idea what customer service means and don’t have any compassion for customers. First, the girl who took our order had a smug look on her face and seemed miserable. Since we have eaten at other McDonald’s here in Singapore, this was a surprise but I decided to let this pass. After a few minutes, I noticed my son wasn’t feeling well and looked like he was about to puke. I hurriedly went to the girl who took our orders earlier asking for a paper bag but she rejected my request. I asked the person who was by the counter, Rebecca, I was informed she was the manager, but was ignored again. I called the attention of a guy who the third person I had to ask, but seemed keen on ignoring so I decided to raise my voice and practically pleaded for them to give me a paper bag as my son was already about to puke. This was the only time the guy gave me a paper bag. We hurriedly went outside so my son could puke and I was so pissed because what I experience with these people was unbelievable. Despite the lack of sensitivity from these McDonalds’ employees, a lady approached me and my son and gave us a plastic bag. I was so grateful to her and thanked her for her kindness. After my son was done puking, I went back inside and asked for the manager and told her just how insensitive they were earlier. Rather than apologizing, the manager said I should be the one to understand since they had many orders and lacked manpower. I told her no, she should be the one to understand since it was a very simple request and they only had to provide me a paper bag which would only take a few seconds and it was an emergency. When I asked her if she’d rather have my son puke inside, she said yes it was ok. Really???! I can’t believe this girl, how insensitive, rude and uncompassionate she was. I’m really shocked that this person even became a manager because her attitude is far from being the qualities of a McDonald’s manager. They seem miserable so why do they work at McDonalds when they are required to serve customers. I really hope this experience won’t happen to anyone else. I was so disappointed because usually most people in Singapore are kind and hospitable but this experience on our last day here was horrible. I hope the owner would help teach their employees about good customer service. Also, I found another bad review in Google about the same Rebecca who works there. Here’s the link https://goo.gl/maps/EXr4yi4ReNz.
The music is like "stupid cupid "music?? Just a little twiste..

22.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0500 hours on 14 March 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.
